entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued April 05 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Foothills flooding possible due to rapid snowmelt... Much warmer temperatures from Friday through Tuesday will increase snowmelt over area foothills. Between 5000 feet and 7000 feet snowpack is currently 150 to 200 percent above normal, with 8 to 15 inches of water contained within this snow.
